PatternEliminator - Class in Unnamed Package
A class that represents eliminators that know how to eliminate any occurrence of any of a given set of pattern sequences

The new eliminator will know how to eliminate, through method eliminateSequence, any occurrence of any of the pattern sequences defined in list patterns
